title: Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump designating May 2025 as Asian American and Pacific Islander Heritage Month. It emphasizes the significant contributions of Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders to the United States, highlighting their resilience and dedication to the American Dream. Notable examples include the Chilukuri family, who immigrated from India and valued education, and Tulsi Gabbard, a military veteran and Director of National Intelligence from American Samoa. The proclamation calls for all Americans to honor this heritage through educational programs and activities, reinforcing the idea that these communities are integral to the nation's fabric and history.
